sentences.en: A: I finally got my rebate for my washer and dryer.
sentences.cn: 我终于拿回我的洗衣机和烘乾机的折扣金了.

sentences.en: Buyers are offered a cash rebate.
Customers are to benefit from a rebate on their electricity bills.
sentences.cn: 顾客将从他们的电费退费中得到实惠。

sentences.en: Deposit any random checks you get - like rebate, rewards or reimbursement checks - into this fund.
sentences.cn: 把你挣的随机钱——比如像回扣，鉴赏，或偿款等——存到这个基金里。

sentences.en: How can you rebate your tax on your summer job?
sentences.cn: 你怎样才能减纳你夏季劳动所得税 呢 ?

sentences.en: I like the cash rebate offer and I prefer no annual fee.
sentences.cn: 我喜欢有现金回馈,也偏好免年费.

sentences.en: I placed an order for desktop pc memory which came with a $20 MIR [mail in rebate].
sentences.cn: 我订购了一个价值20美元的桌面个人电脑存储器，可以申请回扣的。

sentences.en: It goes against our principle to give rebate to our clients.
sentences.cn: 给客户回扣有悖于我方原则.

sentences.en: It is cheering to see that customers are to benefit from a rebate on their electricity bills.
sentences.cn: 想到顾客将享受电费部分退款优惠就叫人心里高兴。

sentences.en: Question : garment export tax rebate rate may be transferred at the 17 % do?
sentences.cn: 服装出口退税利率有可能会上调到17% 吗 ?

sentences.en: The store is offering $ 50 rebate on all their laptops this month.
sentences.cn: 这家店本月提供所有手提电脑50元的折价优惠.

sentences.en: We offer a rebate of ten percent to those who pay cash.
sentences.cn: 我们提供了回扣的百分之十向那些谁付现金.

sentences.en: When in China, apply for tax rebate at designated ICBC business office.
sentences.cn: 回国后, 您可到我行指定网点办理消费退税.

sentences.en: Will you give us a premium rebate just as other underwriter do?
sentences.cn: 您会像其他保险商那样付给我们保险费用回扣 吗 ?

sentences.en: Will you give us a premium rebate just as other underwriters do ?
sentences.cn: 你们能不能像其他保险公司一样在保险费上给予优惠 呢 ?

sentences.en: You are allowed a rebate of $ 10.
sentences.cn: 你可以获得十元的退款.

sentences.en: You can claim a rebate on your tax.
sentences.cn: 你可以要求退回部分税款.

sentences.en: You may be entitled to a tax rebate.

trans.tran_en: an amount of money that is paid back to you when you have paid too much tax, rent etc
